[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

08/05/23

Current phenomena likely related to the lacustrine paranormal phenomena previously observed. Water is ontologically correlated to the concept of Death in several cultures. Viking funeral ships. Caronte. Apanohuacalhuia. If this is indeed another incarnation of [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/la-llorona-model | La Llorona]]] that would mean good news for the weaponization efforts.

[[/div]]
